jeksterslabRutils

Ivan Jacob Agaloos Pesigan 2020-04-05

The goal of jeksterslabRutils is to provide useful utility functions to support scripting and data analysis.

Installation

You can install the released version of jeksterslabRutils from GitHub with:

library(devtools)
install_github("jeksterslabds/jeksterslabRutils")

Example

See GitHub Pages for package documentation.
